title: Daniel and the Six Element Dragons
description: Daniel, now the king of Dragharon, the kingdom of dragons, discovers that there exist five element dragons other than the dragon of wisdom. There's a person named Black Master who wants to possess all their strength and conquer the world with their powers. Daniel wants to oppose him so he goes on the search for other element dragons, to possess their strength and defeat the Black Master. The book is written first in Georgian by 16 years old author and translated to English by author herself.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
